title: Falsely Banned
body:
I came back today after a 4 week vacation to visit my family (If you have read my thread on the SirDevilRS page then this is very similar) ,Before the vacation my account was perfectly fine but, when I came home, I wanted to log on to see how my friends are doing and what they were up to. I pressed enter, I got banned... I never used any scripts, elo boosts (this account is level 29), or anything that was unfair, and I never flamed anyone and I never got a suspension for being toxic because I wasn't, why was I banned? I know you're all about to say "Well why don't you just look in your email, YOU DUMB OR SOMETHING?!", Riot never emailed me telling me why I got banned. I think this is suspicious, rito plz help mae.

{{champion:141}} -"Hi i'm edgy"

Lol, (rito, every player thinks that this guy is very edgy, luv it <3)

replies.body: Well hey there again SirDevilRS. It looks like this account's problem is the same as your other account. Check out our page on [**chargebacks **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334), and hit up our billing agents in a separate [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for this account as well.
